name: GUP (Alex)
description:
Nothing but the remnants of a war-torn world that once housed bird and fish-kind in peace. 

Overtaken by the avian armada and their oppressive bird mechs, the last of fish-kind swore one last bitter farewell.  As the world is destroyed by a flood, one last fish prepares to make it through the blockade before either catastrophe or vengeance find them.

Made for McGill's McGame Jam 2020 (10th Jan- 12th Jan 2020)

Team Members (in alphabetical order) :

Alex Lo (Programming)

Conor Geoghegan (Art)

Jack Xie (Art - Programming)

Jeffrey Tang (Programming)

Marie-Helene Vallieres-Riendeau (Music) Michel Kassis (Programming)
